A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wanted this movie to fail. Hated EP7\, hated the casting (Minus Daisy & Boyega)\, hated the story and especially hated Adam. Congrats to Rian for restoring (a little bit) of faith on the new Star Wars movies. No spoilers\, this movie was AMAZING! I am... satisfied with how it ended... and there were so many epic moments we've never seen. All the hooplah surrounding Rian is justified... for now.
